entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Rocky Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:53 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Berry Hill 7:30 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: -2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -3.4°C
Wind: SSE 15 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain after midnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 10 cm except 20 cm over higher terrain. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight then light before morning. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: Snow or rain changing to freezing rain or ice pellets near noon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain ending before morning then cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023
